Global Stability: Taiwanese Independent Province

  • By Artem V. Shamsutdinov
  • TBD

As the global leadership contest builds up it is important to keep in mind the fundamental changes that are coming.  Impending introduction of nuclear fusion energy and robotization will change the way we live and the way we think.  Our ideology, governance and resource outlooks will change along the way.  Many of the things we are willing to go to war over will no longer be casus bellis. Taiwan that is independent in (almost) everything but foreign policy may be acceptable to all interested parties.
